name: IoTLab
tagline: Internet of Things architecture including an embedded application in sky motes, a gateway, and a web application in JEE
body:
### Welcome to the IoTLab project.

description

To clone the repository : 
```
$ cd your_folder/
$ git clone https://github.com/AnthonyDeroche/iotlab.git

```
